item_category: The New HUAWEI P30 Pro rewrites the rules of photography: the Leica quad camera and the latest light fusion technology create breathtaking photos, with picture perfect light and definition, in extreme low light and night time conditions. The P30 Pro's 50x telephoto zoom breaks the boundaries of telephoto photography, enabling you to capture real detail. Great for taking wildlife and sporting photos from a distance. And the 32MP (f/2.0 aperture) front facing camera enables you to take super HDR selfies.

review_text: Bought this for a friend who loved the model and wanted a spare as newer models have been barred from using Google.

I bought this for my daughter, she loves it, great phone couldn't fault it. I love it too waiting on Argos getting them in again , so I can buy another for myself, thank you Argos. Hurry Argos get more in please.
Cost over £500 and had to return it because it was faulty. Battery wouldn’t charge at all. In fact it was a load of rubbish! Cheap and tacky. Oh well , back to my iPhone !

My first impression when I opened a box was: wow, it is too big. But after a week of using it became OK and comfortable. Let me point the really important things:

-It is amazingly fast, smooth animations etc. I can not even look at my old phone now. Just gorgeous.
-Screen resolution could be higher comparing to iPhoneX and even my old Sony Experia Z. Some jitter when scrolling is also annoying.
-Camera is good in zoom (separate wide anglular + good zoom), but in terms of color can be better
Easy to use got everything you need
Love it can't fault it if only all Huawei mobile was like it .more productions please Argos
Super very nice batariy good

I bought from Argos 2 phones Huawei P30 Pro and they are amazing xx
The price is worth it and Argos can give you a lot of opportunity to make the payment easier for you.
I recommend Argos 5 stars+
The huawei p30 pro it very fast and very good
Excellent phone. So pleased. Bought as surprise for wife. Great.
So far so good, nice phone and it works.

This is my 2nd Huawei P30Pro.
Great Spec and looks really nice too
the battery life is the best and the camera is superb
Great all functions.
Very good phone....stunning looks, hardware is good... Easy to use..

It's fast, battery lasts long and charge quick.
Amazing

This is a really good phone. I have bought it for my wife and she is so happy. She had Samsung Galaxy S7 before and she said Huawei P30 Pro is much better then Samsung. The only one thing is driving us crazy... Her new phone is talking in chinese (?) every time when she received a WhatsApp message! Even when she silence her phone! Tried to change it in settings, but we couldn't.
Looks fab ..........

The phone looks great and the price was good.
I really like it and I will recommend it to my friends!

It was a gift for my wife and she’s very happy with her huawei

I am still in awe at the Features of this Phone. The Battery easily lasts Two Days on a Single Charge, and the Camera is to die for... Especially the Night Shots.

The P30 Pro is Fast and Lightweight, with s Large Suite of Sensors. Argos also kindly gave After Sales tech support, so one needs not worry about anything

Brought this phone to replace my honor play that I got a year a year ago, the photos from this phone are amazing and battery life is incredible for a top tier phone.

This is the last one to have access to Google apps for now, and this was the reason why I went for the p30 pro

I really happy about my new phone
Camera is good quality 
Battery life is very long

Profiles & data transfer from old Samsung was seamless, achieved by wif-fi putting phones next to one another. Very slinky phone, excited about the camera. Not sure about the position with the Google Playstore Apps but will find out no doubt. Loads of features. Early days.
Very good product and nice

I love this handset.

Build quality is great. 
Expandable memory. 
Lovely screen. 
Only one speaker, but it is loud, and I always use Bluetooth headphones anyway.
It's a very good phone
Fantastic phone for the money I couldn't be happier with my purchase

After extensive research I opted for the Huawei P30 Pro after years of using Samsung phones. I am extremely impressed with everything.  The camera quality far exceeds the Samsung S10. The phone is very fast and call quality is brilliant.

I decided to replace my Samsung S7 edge with the Huawei mainly on the strength of the camera. I was not disappointed the camera is stunning.  Battery life is extremely good too. Currently lasts for two days between charges.  I'm not 100% sure about Huawei's user interface but it's Android so you expect differences between manufacturers.  Fingerprint security and face unlock is fast and accurate.
Does everything I want and more, crazy cool features, sick camera, battery life for days and looks really slick.

The style of the phone is nice, not sure what the curved screen is achieving, makes screen covers less convenient.
The camera is great and actually the main reason I went for this model so not disappointed at all.
The phone is SO slippy! In pockets, on surfaces etc. P20 Pro came with a cover & a screen cover on it & this came with neither.
Runs smoother than P20 Pro and still is supportee by Google unlike P40.

The main reason for this phone being great is the camera. It really is that good. 50x zoom that's actually clearer than an S10 at 8x zoom. Pictures in virtually no light that appear with colour as if it was daytime. 128gb is a brilliant amount of storage. The rest of the phone however is basically the same as the mate 20 pro. Same cpu, same screen, same storage, both have reverse wireless charging, in display fingerprint and wide angle lens. 
Battery life is incredible as ever.

Wanted a good camera phone for wildlife and have not had it long enough to test its capabilities, but the battery life is excellent and all the functions seem to be responsive and operate smoothly. I am not too worried about looks and have it in a waterproof defender case. There are virtually no instructions other than charging, so you will have to go online to work out the features.

My wife has one for one year and is very good .
good batery. nice pictures
I used P20 PRO before. This phone is just incredible. Battery life is amazing,usually last 2 days.

I love it from the moment I opened the box, this amazing colour, crystal, just wow. Coming from Samsung my whole life I was a little bit afraid if it was a good decision to change and literally I couldn't make a better choice. Setting up was easy, the camera is brilliant and battery life amazing. Has many cool features that probably never ever I will use, but who knows maybe one day I will need them and they are there.The charging time is very good. So happy with my phone. Baby
Ok so I have had the phone a little while and I love the colour of it. The battery life it really good it is quick and easy to get started. Is a good phone would definetly recommend to a friend.

This is by far the best phone I've had, camera is amazing with so many features, battery life is fab, and it's got wireless charging capability too so glad I stuck to Huawei brand I would definitely recommend it.
Absolutely would recommend this phone battery life is great, easy to use, fantastic camera with many fab setting to create a magnitude of really pretty images. Collected the next day in store.
Very nice and fantastic phone

Chinese manufacturer with impeccable quality and design. Yes they are standing on the shoulders of giants without a doubt. It does not take a genius to note that that the design steals from Samsung, however the back of the phone with it's ultimate AI Camera the phone still becomes its own name and overall design. Great for digital artists and photos. 
Verdict: Once upon a time the West provided blueprints to the east, quality and design while China copied. Huawei is top quality Chinese Made
